overview: In a world over-saturated with snow-porn, mass amateurism, and an ever-changing status quo there stands alone one super crew. From the creators of Dope and Dope 2 is a snowboard picture of epic proportions. Introducing Dope 3, counterculture, creativity, friendship, followers, fans, fun, insanity, taking it to a whole new level of dope, the third level in fact. Do your homework, the results speak for themselves.
title: Dope 3
